tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE influencer_content_metadata (
    influencer_id INT,
    content_id INT,
    content_type VARCHAR,
    performance_data JSONB,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Posts (
    post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id UUID,
    caption STRING,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceData (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id UUID,
    impressions INT,
    reach INT,
    engagement_rate FLOAT,
    click_through_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id INT,
    post_text TEXT,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE Content (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id INT,
    content_type VARCHAR(50),
    publish_date DATE,
    performance_metrics JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    clicks INT,
    likes INT,
    shares INT,
    comments INT
);
